summary: The Fortress from Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
descriptionHtml:
The great fortress from my favorite story. I hope you enjoy this mod of Helm's Deep based off of the film The Lord of the Rings The Two Towers. Thanks for checking this out. :) 

HELP: Currently having one final issue. I am trying to allow this to be completely viewable in the distance instead of appearing as one moves closer. How does one fix this. Thank you guys :) 

REQUIREMENTS: None :) Just make sure you have the game
author: Argon0981
